statements: DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM HVAC_System_Sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor';
DELETE FROM HVAC_Maintenance_Logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' AND technician = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND reading_value < 20;
